original_title: BABYMETAL - Arises - Beyond The Moon - Legend - M -
overview: BABYMETAL will be appearing at Port Nagoya (Nagoya International Exhibition Hall) in early July for 2 consecutive days. Today is the first concert with the promising title "BABYMETAL ARISES". At the same time, it is a "LEGEND M" concert on the occasion of Moas birthday.
title: BABYMETAL - Arises - Beyond The Moon - Legend - M -
